column5: I was fishing Balsam Lake over the long weekend (report to follow w/a video) and on my way back a few buddies of mine told me to check out Kirkfiield lake, which was an accidental man-made lake with clean turquoise waters and monster bass.  On my way there I stumbled upon this impressive lift lock, and what's even more amazing is that it was built over a 100 years ago.  <iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/Q_uybnxXwYQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
The biggest one in the world is in Peterborough livedmtherenmy whole life never been through it
